Headline: Park Seo Joon To Reportedly Join Brie Larson And More In “The Marvels” | Soompi
Text: Park Seo Joon may be joining the Marvel Cinematic Universe!On June 15, industry representatives reported that the actor will be starring in “The Marvels,” the sequel to “Captain Marvel.” According to the report, he will head to the United States for filming in the second half of this year after completing filming for “Concrete Utopia,” which he is currently working on.Regarding the report, Park Seo Joon’s agency Awesome ENT responded, “No comment.”Brie Larson, Teyonah Parris, and Iman Vellani are among the actors confirmed for the cast of the film, which will be directed by Nia DaCosta.If confirmed, Park Seo Joon will be the third Korean actor to star in a Marvel movie following Claudia Kim in “Avengers: Age of Ultron” and Ma Dong Seok in “Eternals.”“The Marvels” is scheduled to be released on November 11, 2022 in the United States.Stay tuned for updates!In the meantime, watch Park Seo Joon in “What’s Wrong with Secretary Kim“: Watch Now Source (1) (2)
